data.title: Maestro's magic in Neethaane En Ponvasantham
data.meta_description: Now that the songs have become a rage among us fans at least, let's see what the movie has to offer. We really should temper down our expectations though. But r
data.text:
sagi Tue Nov 27, 2012 6:03 am

Now that the songs have become a rage among us fans at least, let's see what the movie has to offer. We really should temper down our expectations though. But rest assured, we are in for a musical treat and that is all that matters, right Dec 14th is the tentative release date eventhough the ads still say December veLiyeedu without any dates.

[You must be registered and logged in to see this image.]

Last edited by Nerd on Thu Nov 29, 2012 3:26 am; edited 1 time in total

Re: Maestro's magic in Neethaane En Ponvasantham

groucho070 Tue Nov 27, 2012 6:17 am

Expectation very low. Looks like another on and off relationship movie judging from songs and trailer. Same subject in VTV, but well handled

Re: Maestro's magic in Neethaane En Ponvasantham

app_engine Tue Nov 27, 2012 6:55 pm

Gautam says same kuttai but different mattais :

http://www.behindwoods.com/tamil-movie-news-1/nov-12-04/gautham-menon-neethane-en-ponvasantham-27-11-12.html

Neethane En Ponvasantham has the same structure every love story has, but the moments the lovers share makes the film interesting, claims Gautham Menon.

...

...

Gautham claims that Nithya will be a Puthumai Penn in the department of romance and calls Jiiva the embodiment of love.

Sam's own voice. And she has tweeted that for YVM its sinnmayi. nalla vELai thappichOm.. Sinnmayi singlehandedly brought down the Sri Rama Rajjiyam experience (among other films) for me. One of the most annoying voices in the planet.

Nep_Movie also says Dec 14 for sure. So 14 days to go

Re: Maestro's magic in Neethaane En Ponvasantham

sagi Fri Nov 30, 2012 6:00 pm

I already see so many hate comments on the trailer video by Rahman fans why'yaa? WHY?! mokka BGM-aamaam.. enga irunthu dhaan kiLambi varaanungaLO.. But it feels good. indha vayasulayum, andhaaLu meesic and the reach yaarayO remmbbba distap pannuthu..
